body:
Hi few quick questions:
- What are the rules and regulations concerning advertising other servers on the forums? (I say this because of this thread http://avicus.net/forums/6aaf332fa from roboticboy)
- What ip's can I and can't I say on the forums.

I ask this because anybody saying things like that on my own server would receive a permanent ban. Also before I changed to prison I could not say the ip of my server (Which was a map build server (Therefore alot more avicus related)) why can roboticboy do that?

Thanks,
Subzero

title: Advertising Rules, forums,  etc.

replies.body: He is technically hosting a public event. That gets more appeal and also it more community driven. Not everyone in the world wants too make a map. Also clearly he was given an all go from the Sr Staff.
replies.body_tagged: He is technically hosting a public event. That gets more appeal and also it more community driven. Not everyone in the world wants too make a map. Also clearly he was given an all go from the Sr Staff.

replies.body:
Avicus Rules
  • Linking to content that promotes other Minecraft se
  • Posts that discuss details regarding other Minecraft servers is not allowed. Certain sections of these posts may be obscured if the post exhibits any text that could be considered advertising.
replies.body_tagged:
Avicus Rules
  • Linking to content that promotes other Minecraft se
  • Posts that discuss details regarding other Minecraft servers is not allowed. Certain sections of these posts may be obscured if the post exhibits any text that could be considered advertising.

replies.body: He was given permission to give out the Ip for his server
replies.body_tagged: He was given permission to give out the Ip for his server

replies.body:
General Etiquette and Behaviour
Rule 3 
  1. The communication features provided through our Minecraft server, the forums and the Avicus Teamspeak server is a privilage. Abusing messaging features through partaking in one of the following actions below is strictly against the rules. If you are unsure if content that you would like to send through chat is allowed, please contact a staff member to verify the content.
    • Spamming chat. This involves repeatedely sending similar or identical messages to the point in which it may be bothersome and annoying to other users
    • Linking to material that may be considered objectionable.
    • Linking to content that promotes other Minecraft services. This includes, but is not limited to, other Minecraft servers and their corresponding websites and social media content that promotes other Minecraft servers.
replies.body_tagged:
General Etiquette and Behaviour
Rule 3 
  1. The communication features provided through our Minecraft server, the forums and the Avicus Teamspeak server is a privilage. Abusing messaging features through partaking in one of the following actions below is strictly against the rules. If you are unsure if content that you would like to send through chat is allowed, please contact a staff member to verify the content.
    • Spamming chat. This involves repeatedely sending similar or identical messages to the point in which it may be bothersome and annoying to other users
    • Linking to material that may be considered objectionable.
    • Linking to content that promotes other Minecraft services. This includes, but is not limited to, other Minecraft servers and their corresponding websites and social media content that promotes other Minecraft servers.

replies.body:
Here's the thing about it:
Robo and I didn't make te UHC server to bring people away from Avicus; we made it to
bring the community closer together. 
Also, we have explicit permission from the Senior Staff, so you'd have to bring it up with them.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: No I get that, if anything a build server though is more beneficial for Avicus but I was never allowed to. I even made a post asking about how I can give the ip.
